name: Overview

[{"id":"877f411b-972a-4a7f-bf9c-1a524af70abb","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"set_pkg","styles":{"code":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a409e15e-0a7f-4678-8afc-eba382dd0446","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose:

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Defines the root directory of the project being analyzed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"17d47c9c-f708-4e4e-9831-e36f5b073964","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"What it does:

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Stores the provided package path as the analysis scope. This path is later used to distinguish ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"internal project modules","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" from ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"external dependencies","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"46f8a8a3-6b76-470c-9cf0-a07e8580da39","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When it’s used:

","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Called during initialization, before import hooks are installed, to establish the boundary for import tracking.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ab759747-b40a-4155-8aad-96ca3b6355f4","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
